name: CBT Panic Emulator
description:
I've experienced health-based panic disorder for most of my adult life, so I figured I'd put a psx spin on it.

This game was made for a "Two Minute Horror Game Jam", so it's very short, but I plan on adding additional levels in the future for more panic attack fun.

CONTROLS: WASD + Mouse to move, Left-click to interact.

Credits:

Graphics, music, and design by VaporShark

PS1 renderer by dsoft20: https://github.com/dsoft20/psx_retroshader

Znric font used from https://www.dafont.com/zrnic.font

Software used: Godot 3.2, Blender 2.8, Audacity, and Gimp
